EzyFit Function Reference<< Prev | Next >> 
axisc
Centered axis

Description 
axisc centers the axis of the current plot. 
axisc X or axisc Y only centers the horizontal or vertical axe.
See Also 
axis0, gridc. 
 
Published output in the Help browser 
   showdemo axisc
